data.description: Fetch song lyrics from the internet
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
WWW::Lyrics obviously belongs in the WWW:: namespace as it fetches
    the lyrics from the internet. Lyrics::Fetcher is a similar module,
    but WWW::Lyrics is much more friendly. Lyrics extraction is executed
    in a simpler manner which does not require a different "driver"
    module for each lyrics site, so it is less likely to break if
    changes are made to the lyrics domains' page templates.
